problem.markdown:
>>What are the two ways of using Excel with Power BI?<<
[x] Import Excel data into Power BI [ ] Import Excel connection into Power BI [ ] Import Excel charts into Power BI [x] Connect, Manage, and View Excel in Power BI
[explanation] You can either import your Excel data to Power BI or connect, manage and view the Excel workbook in Power BI. [explanation]
problem.p: What are the two ways of using Excel with Power BI?

checkboxgroup.label: What are the two ways of using Excel with Power BI?
checkboxgroup.choice: Import Excel data into Power BI
Import Excel connection into Power BI
Import Excel charts into Power BI
Connect, Manage, and View Excel in Power BI

div.p: You can either import your Excel data to Power BI or connect, manage and view the Excel workbook in Power BI.
